titleStmt.title: Collonel Grey's portmanteau opened; his sealed, mis-directed, and returned letter discovered by a copie thereof, found among his other papers. Which is here printed and published with some queries and animadversions thereupon. To deliver, from the dangers of their caballs, such as are not acquainted with Scottish methods and mysteries.
titleStmt.author: Colomiès, Paul, 1638-1692.

titleStmt.author: Colomiès, Paul, 1638-1692.
